meta_description: WealthX helps you understand cash flow, budgets, and assets — effortlessly.
meta_keywords: WealthX, personal finance, budget, expense tracking, cash flow, iCloud
title: WealthX — See your cash flows, change habits naturally.
hero_subtitle: Understand cash flow, budgets, and assets — effortlessly.
features_subtitle: Build better money habits with structure and clarity.
card_accounts_desc: Manage assets and liabilities with clarity.
privacy_subtitle: Your data stays with you — stored locally or in iCloud.
privacy_item3: Icons you choose (emoji, SF Symbols, custom images).
privacy_item4: iCloud sync (optional) via your own iCloud account.
privacy_use1: To provide and improve app features.
privacy_use2: To keep data consistent across devices.
privacy_use3: No ads — never used for marketing.
privacy_share_p: We do not sell or share your data. Disclosure only when legally required.
privacy_storage_p: Data is stored locally or in iCloud (optional), protected by Apple system security.
